name: Tyrogue
author: Miki Tanaka
flavor_text: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

attacks.name: Smash Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

rule_box: If this Baby Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and your opponent announces an attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything else). If tails, your opponent’s turn ends.
